original_text: and followed the practices of the nations the Lord had driven out before them, as well as the practices that the kings of Israel had introduced.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 이방 사람의 규례와 이스라엘 여러 왕이 세운 율례를 행하였음이라

sentences.original_text: and followed the practices of the nations
the Lord had driven out before them
that the kings of Israel had introduced
